title: Mac can't load into Live Server games
body: I use a mac to play league of legends right now, and beginning from yesterday I couldn't load into any games. All there is was black screen and nothing ever showed up. I had to force quit to get out of the page. Riot please fix this, as im trying reinstalling the client right now and i'll reply to this post in the comments.

replies.body: After reinstalling and hextech repair it still doesnt work.

Sometimes that black screen will happen because your network stalls trying to connect to the game server (the client stuff and game are hosted a bit separately, requiring a new connection to be made on the loading screen). Try updating your port forwarding and DNS server settings with the steps and videos below, and give that a test in a custom game.

[**Port Forwarding**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq7) & [**DNS **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq4)

PS: The videos are only for windows last I checked, but they can help a little. Refer to the Mac guide for those exact steps.

Hi Broporo thanks for your response! I saw the videos however I'm wondering does changing to a public DNS negatively impact our devices?

Edit: Be careful if your using the tips from the video because this did not work for me. If your changing anything keep your previous information incase this doesn't work.

Changing that DNS server just tells your connection to goto Google first, which is typically one of the best routes possible. It can't negatively impact anything, only get you a smoother connection. It's not always going to be a guaranteed fix like any other tech troubleshooting, but knowing that one thing didn't help let's us know the direction we need to move in. One step will never be the final solution. Make sure you went through the port forwarding steps as well as the others listed in that guide if you haven't yet.

If those steps still don't help, go ahead and reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look through some of your

I did what you said but its still not working....Im afraid it's not a connection problem but rather a game crash. Because back then when I had a connection problem I was able to Alt+Tab out but for this one I had to Option+Cmd+ESC to force quit.

Yeeeaaa the way you describe it really does make it sound like its more of a crash problem than connection. Thanks for letting me know! 

In that case, check out this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#section-mac) as well. If those steps don't seem to help either, hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your game and network logs so they can look deeper into the problem.

I'm having the same exact problem. They said they fixed the issue but I am still having the problem. I have removed it and redownloaded the client countless times and its still not working. I have tried contacting league to help fix the problem and I've had a lot of trouble getting a hold of them. They ignore me. I get they are most likely trying to fix the issue but it has been 2 days now with no response from anybody and no updates on the issue.
Yo guys a Riot supp told me just spam your Enter Key when it turns black, and it should solve it.

Pretty sure that same tech just came over and told me this as well and I was like o_O....


As it turns out on Macs, this black screen happens when you get disconnected on the loading screen. The reconnect button pops up, but for some reason, it's hidden behind the loading screen. This is why spamming enter works, eventually that enter spam will hit reconnect and force the client to start connecting again.

I guess it doesn't work for me since I set the in-game League to override some Mac system commands (so I can cmd + q to level an ability instead of quitting the game). It's the only option where you have to be in-game to change it (can't find from settings > in-game).

Edit: So I was right about the Mac system re-bind being an option only available in-game. I uninstalled the client and re-installed which reset the Mac system re-bind and spamming enter now works. Problem is that I'm used to cmd + q, w, e to level abilities :C
I moved my league to the trash and reinstalled it and that hasn't worked for me mine must still be on somehow...

how long did you have to spam it for?
i just went into a custom, got the black screen, spammed it for a minute, and it didnt work
